parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a merchant. Required for all merchant-level requests(All ONDC user calling point product related APIs)

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, and partner_key. SHA256 hashing algorithm. More detail: https://open.shopee.com/documents/v2/v2.partner_api.htm#Sign-API-Requests

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: The error key if there's error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Messages about the error and it's cause if there's errors

children.name: location_id
children.description: Location identifier for stocks. Different location_ids represent that your addresses are in different fuel stocks.

children.name: warehouse_name
children.description: The warehouse name filled in when creating the warehouse address
